eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: North Dakota; AT 08:00 AM ON OCT 09, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 09:00 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a required weekly test of the North Dakota Emergency Alert System. This concludes the test. No action is necessary.
